name: RoadRollerDa
description:
Run away from the Road Roller!

Avoid traffic and keep the momentum up! Reach the end!

Controlls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera

"Space" - Jump

Double press "Space" - Double Jump

R - Reload Level

ESC - Exit Application

Made by Haavard (GameJam Team: Lone Wolf Inc)

Assets used:

Low Poly Ultimate Pack

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733

Easy Character Movement

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/easy-character-movement-...

Sounds from https://www.zapsplat.com/ and https://freesound.org/
